2. Click on '....'
3. Scroll down to '....'
4. See error

## 스크린샷 

## 환경(Desktop)
 - OS: [e.g. iOS]
 - Browser [e.g. chrome, safari]
 - Version [e.g. 22]

## 환경(Mobile)
 - Device: [e.g. iPhone6]
 - OS: [e.g. iOS8.1]
 - Browser [e.g. stock browser, safari]
 - Version [e.g. 22]
